metadata.title: CVE-2022-27195 jenkins-2-plugins/parameterized-trigger: Information disclosure (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin 2.43 and earlier captures environment variables passed to builds triggered using Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin, including password parameter values, in their `build.xml` files. These values are stored unencrypted and can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
